skills.title: Web Developer MERN
skills.description: Unleashed my inner developer, building a full-fledged MERN stack app (think MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) from YouTube wisdom. Got hands-on with SRMLaunchPad.

skills.title: Cloud Arcitect
skills.description: Propelled by a AICTE Government of India AWS Architecting internship,  Gained the knowledge to design secure, scalable solutions using core AWS services like EC2, S3, and IAM.

skills.title: C and C++
skills.description: Possess a strong understanding of core C/C++ programming concepts, including syntax, data structures.Familiarity with common data structures and algorithms for efficient problem-solving.

skills.title: Python & Django
skills.description: Possess a strong understanding of core Python programming concepts like data structures, control flow, and functions. Gained practical experience building web applications with the Django framework.

skills.title: AI and ML
skills.description: Gained practical experience in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning through a government-sponsored internship. AICTE AWS Academy Machine Learning Foundations
